code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[city,setCity]=useState('');const[weather,setWeather]=useState(null);const getWeather=async()=>{const response=await fetch(`/api/weather?city=${city}`);const data=await response.json();setWeather(data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-blue-100 p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Weather Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"border p-2 rounded mb-4",placeholder:"Enter city name",value:city,onChange:e=>setCity(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",onClick:getWeather,children:"Get Weather"}),weather&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-8 p-4 bg-white rounded shadow-md text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold",children:weather.city}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperature: ",weather.temp," \xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Humidity: ",weather.humidity," %"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Wind Speed: ",weather.wind," m/s"]})]})]});}export default App;
